Play
Membership
As an exclusive private member-owned country club, invitation to membership is extended only to property owners in the Woodfield communities.
Equity membership is available in two categories: Full Equity and Standard Equity.
Full Equity Members
have complete golf, tennis and social privileges.
Standard Equity Members
have complete tennis and social privileges, along with a limited number of golf uses throughout the year.
All Members have access to dining, fitness, pickleball, pool and social activities throughout our beautiful facilities.
Full Equity (golf) membership is currently sold out. However,
buyers can bypass the golf waitlist and
immediately obtain a golf membership
by purchasing a home where the seller has “Transferability.” For more information about Transferability, please call the Membership Office at 561-989-7272.
REQUEST INFORMATION
The Woodfield Communities are comprised of Woodfield Boca Raton
, Woodfield Hunt Club and the Carriage Homes at Woodfield.
Membership at Woodfield Boca Raton
®
is mandatory, meaning all home buyers are Members of the Club.
A one-year Trial membership is available to homeowners in the Woodfield Hunt Club and Woodfield Carriage Homes.

About Boca Raton
Welcome to warm, sunny Boca Raton, Florida!
Nestled within Boca Raton is Woodfield. The 830-acre gated site with 20 individual neighborhoods was designed so that each community has its own identity, separated from its neighbor by sparkling lakes and impeccably manicured golf holes.
Visit us to see for yourself why so many families come home to Woodfield.
Click here
to view a map of the Woodfield community.
REQUEST INFORMATION
Shopping/Attractions:
Mizner Park
Boca Center
Town Center Mall
Delray Marketplace
Broward Center for Performing Arts
Kravis Center
South County Regional Park
Sugar Sand Park
REQUEST INFORMATION
Boca Raton is conveniently located:
24 minutes from Ft. Lauderdale
29 minutes from West Palm Beach
54 minutes from Miami

Meet The Catering Team
Name
Mandy Markham
Title
Director of Catering
Hometown:
Waterbury, Connecticut
Degrees/Certifications:
Event Planning Certification, AA Hospitality Management
Catering Background:
When planning my own wedding I found my passion! I enjoyed the planning process so much that I wanted to make it into a career. I got my feet wet in the catering field planning memorable events at a catering hall in Monroe, Connecticut. Now, I am soaking up the sun in Florida where I have the pleasure of planning a variety of exciting and enriching events for Woodfield members and guests.
Party Planning Words of Wisdom:
The smallest detail can leave the largest lasting impression.
Add to Contact
Name
Bart Messing
Title
Executive Chef
Hometown:
Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, New York
Degrees/Certifications:
Culinary Institute of America
Catering Background:
I began my culinary career on a nuclear submarine as a cook in the Navy, from there I attended the Culinary Institute of America at Hyde Park, New York. After graduation, I held positions at a number of high-profile restaurants and hotels in New York City, including the Stanhope Hotel, the 3 star French restaurant La Reserve and The Essex House Hotel. Now I am happily rooted in Florida as the Executive Chef at Woodfield.
Party Planning Words of Wisdom:
Anything is possible! Our individually customized menus will meet and exceed your expectations!
Add to Contact
Name
Mariela Baez Baez
Title
Catering Manager
Hometown:
Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
Degrees/Certifications:
Bachelor of Arts, Hospitality Administration
Catering Background:
Being able to be a part of someone’s special day has been my passion since I was in college. During college, I worked as an intern at a planning agency. After I moved to the United States, I entered the hotel world and worked at Marriott for over 9 years. While working at Marriott I made my way into Event Planning. Now at Woodfield, I have the pleasure of helping Members and guests plan special life events. With every event I am given the opportunity to make someone’s special day a memorable one.
Party Planning Words of Wisdom:
Relax and be a guest at your event. You won’t always remember every detail, but you will remember the moments.
Add to Contact
Name
Lauren Cunningham
Title
Catering Manager
Hometown:
Derry, Ireland
Degrees/Certifications:
Master of Science in Hospitality Management
Catering Background:
Since interning with the Walt Disney Company, I have been keenly interested in the hospitality industry. However, it was not until I started at Woodfield as a seasonal employee that I discovered my passion for helping people plan special life moments. During a brief return to Ireland, I entered the hotel industry and took a position at Bishops Gate Hotel as an Event Sales Coordinator. Now back in the United States permanently, I relish the daily opportunity to assist Members and guests in planning events for their special life moments.
Party Planning Words of Wisdom:
Details are the difference between a good event and a great one.
